result.markdown: --- title: "The Taxonomy of Academic Sustainability" description: | A short description of the post. author: - name: Rodney Dyer url: https://dyerlab.org affiliation: Center for Environmental Studies affiliation_url: https://ces.vcu.edu orcid_id: 0000-0003-4707-3453 date: 2015-10-29 output: distill::distill_article: self_contained: false --- Been working on a lexicographic analysis of ‘Sustainability' as published by the journals _PNAS_ and _Sustainability_. Here are the stemmed word forms for 366 published articles represented as a hierarchical clustering. The wordclouds represent the top 10 word stems per group.
